posts.title: Xiaomi Redmi 5 Plus 4/64GB Black
posts.htmlText: Display (5.99, IPS, 2160x1080)/ Qualcomm Snapdragon 625 (2.0 GHz)/ main camera: 12 Mp, front-camera: 5 Mp/ RAM 4 GB/ 64 GB ROM + microSD/SDHC (up to 128 GB)/ 3G/ LTE/ GPS/ GLONASS/ support 2х SIM-cards (Nano-SIM)/ Android 7.1 (Nougat) / 4000 mAh*h

posts.title: Samsung Galaxy S9+ 64GB Midnight Black
posts.htmlText: Display (6.2, Super AMOLED, 2960х1440)/ Samsung Exynos 9810 (4 x 2.7 GHz + 4 x 1.7 GHz)/ double main camera: 12 Mp + 12 Mp, front-camera: 8 Mp/ RAM 6 GB/ 64 GB ROM + microSD (up to 400 GB)/ 3G/ LTE/ GPS/ support 2х SIM-cards (Nano-SIM)/ Android 8.0 (Oreo) / 3500 mAh*h

posts.title: Huawei P20 Pro 6/128GB Black
posts.htmlText: Display (6.1, OLED, 2240x1080)/ HiSilicon Kirin 970 (4 cores 2.36 GHz + 4 cores 1.8 GHz)/ three main cameras: 40 Mp + 20 Mp + 8 Mp, front-camera: 24 Mp/ RAM 6 GB/ 128 GB ROM + microSD/SDHC (up to 256 GB)/ 3G/ LTE/ GPS/ GLONASS/ support 2х SIM-cards (Nano-SIM)/ Android 8.1 (Oreo)/ 4000 mAh*h

posts.title: Apple iPhone X 3/64GB Silver
posts.htmlText: Display (5.8, OLED (Super Retina HD), 2436x1125)/ Apple A11 Bionic/ main camera: double 12 Mp, front-camera: 7 Mp/ RAM 3 GB/ 64 GB ROM/ 3G/ LTE/ GPS/ Nano-SIM/ iOS 11

posts.title: Sony Xperia XZ2 Compact 4/64GB Black
posts.htmlText: Display (5, IPS, 2160x1080)/ Qualcomm Snapdragon 845 (4 x 2.7 GHz + 4 x 1.7 GHz)/ main camera: 19 Mp, front-camera: 5 Mp/ RAM 4 GB/ 64 GB ROM + microSD (up to 400 GB)/ 3G/ LTE/ GPS/ support 2х SIM-cards (Nano-SIM)/ Android 8.0 (Oreo)/ 2870 mAh*h
